package.name: AdiumyGreenBlack
package.description: An Adium contactlist style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long: This is the new Green Adiumy. Author: "I think basic Adiumys with a black beak looks really nice. So here is the GreenBlack Adiumy." This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=6194
